The Mecure Health Limited Recruiting is presently open for a position of Health Practioner: all qualified and interested candidates are required to see the skills outlined below and apply

Job title: Health Practioner.

Job Location: Lagos State.

Duration: full time.

Deadline: September 12, 2024.

Address: Me Cure House, Apapa-Oshodi Express Way, Papa Ajao 102215, Lagos.

Contents

Responsibilities

Required Proficiency

How to apply for this offer

Health Practioner Job Location: Lagos Deadline: September 12, 2024

Responsibilities | Health Practioner

All applicants are required to have the ability to carry out the following responsibility listed below:

  • Provide advice and assistance to householders and businesses.
  • Advice on health and safety issues.
  • Carry out food hygiene and food standards inspections.
  • Take photos, produce drawings, remove samples and carry out interviews as part of the inspection procedure.
  • Being able to carry out or unplanned visits and inspections to make sure compliance with health and safety legislation and take an action to improve conditions.
  • Investigate complaints from the general public.
  • Investigate accidents at work and complaints about poor values of health and safety, identifying any areas of negligence.
  • Give talks at public inquiries, meetings, and exhibitions and ensure compliance through education, advice, and enforcement.

 Required Proficiency| Health Practitioner at MeCure Limited

You must be expertise by showing evidence of the following

  • Excellent written and oral communication skills
  • Confidence in dealing with the public.
  • Strong scientific ability and technical understanding.
  • Self-motivation
  • Good decision-making skills
  • Must the ability to work independently and as a member of a team
  • A methodical, careful approach to gathering facts and assessing evidence.
  • Good time-management and organizational skills, including being able to manage your own workload well.
  • A flexible approach to work.

How to apply for this offer| Health Practitioner at MeCure Limited

Any interested and qualified candidates should forward their Curriculum Vitae (CV) to mecureng@gmail.com using the Job Title as the subject of the mail.
